program_information.program_name_citation: Five years after parents entered the New Hope program (and 2 years after benefits ended), many of the effects of the New Hope program on their children's achievement, motivation, and social behavior remained.
program_information.target_population_citation: a package of policies designed to reduce poverty and provide work supports to low-income adults

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: New Hope had positive effects on children's school achievement, motivation, and social behavior, primarily for boys, across the age range 6-16... The program produced improvements in family income and use of organized child care and activity settings
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: parents were randomly assigned to program or control groups
